name: Dryad's Apprentice
text: You have learned secrets of woodworking from dryads.
benefit: You can cast wood shape as a spell-like ability at will, but only on a piece of wood no larger than 1 pound. You gain a +4 bonus on Craft checks involving wood, and you are always treated as if you had masterwork artisanâ€™s woodworking tools when attempting such checks.
